# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(4, -60)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position 4, -60)

### Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of following entities
- Iron chest (position 4.5, -58.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in sufficient quantities before attempting to craft an item. In this case, the agent repeatedly failed to craft iron chests due to a shortage of iron plates. Prioritize the production of iron plates before attempting to craft iron chests.
- Check the crafting requirements of an item before attempting to craft it.

## NAMESPACE
